Abaya.name: Abaya
Abaya.info: Deploy: Spawn Torrential Rain, Clear Skies or Arachas Venom.

Aelirenn.name: Aelirenn
Aelirenn.info: When you have 5 or more Elf Allies, play this Unit from your Deck.

Aeromancy.name: Aeromancy
Aeromancy.info: Play a Bronze or Silver Hazard card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

Aglaïs.name: Aglaïs
Aglaïs.info: Deploy: You may Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Special card from your opponent's Graveyard.

Alba Armored Cavalry.name: Alba Armored Cavalry
Alba Armored Cavalry.info: Deploy: Look at the top 3 Units from your opponent's Deck. Choose one and Boost self by its base Power.

Alba Pikeman.name: Alba Pikeman
Alba Pikeman.info:
After 1 turn, at the start of your turn, play a copy of this Unit from your Deck on the row.
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

Alba Spearmen.name: Alba Spearmen
Alba Spearmen.info: Whenever a player draws a card to their Hand, Boost self by 1.

Albrich.name: Albrich
Albrich.info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, both players draw the top card from their Decks. Your opponent's card is Revealed.

Ale of the Ancestors.name: Ale of the Ancestors
Ale of the Ancestors.info:
While on a row, bathe the row in Golden Froth.
Golden Froth: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost 3 random Units on the row by 1.
Deploy: Gain 6 Armor.

Alzur's Double–Cross.name: Alzur's Double–Cross
Alzur's Double–Cross.info: Boost the Highest Bronze or Silver Unit from your Deck by 2 and play it.

Ancient Foglet.name: Ancient Foglet
Ancient Foglet.info: If a Fog Hazard is anywhere on the Board at the start of your turn, Boost self by 1.

Arachas.name: Arachas
Arachas.info: Deploy: Play all copies of this Unit from your Deck.

Arachas Behemoth.name: Arachas Behemoth
Arachas Behemoth.info:
Whenever an Ally Consumes a card, Spawn an Arachas Hatchling on a random row and Damage self by 1 (ignoring Armor).
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

Archespore.name: Archespore
Archespore.info:
Every turn, at the start of your turn, move this Unit to a random row on its side, Damage a random Enemy by 1 and Heal self.
Deathwish: Damage a random Enemy by 4.

Archgriffin.name: Archgriffin
Archgriffin.info: Deploy: Clear Hazards from the row on your side. Move a Bronze card from one Graveyard to the other.

Aretuza Adept.name: Aretuza Adept
Aretuza Adept.info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze Hazard card from your Deck.

Artefact Compression.name: Artefact Compression
Artefact Compression.info: Transform a Bronze or Silver Unit into a Jade Figurine.

Assassin.name: Assassin
Assassin.info: Deploy: Damage the Unit to the left by its base Power (but by no more than 10).

Assire var Anahid.name: Assire var Anahid
Assire var Anahid.info: Deploy: Shuffle up to 2 Bronze or Silver cards from either Graveyard into that player's Deck.

Auckes.name: Auckes
Auckes.info: Deploy: Toggle 2 Units' Lock. If Enemies, Damage them by 1 as well.

Avallac'h.name: Avallac'h
Avallac'h.info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, both players draw the top 2 cards from their Decks.

Avallac'h: The Sage.name: Avallac'h: The Sage
Avallac'h: The Sage.info: Deploy: Spawn a copy of a random different Gold or Silver Unit from your opponent's Deck.

Ballista.name: Ballista
Ballista.info:
Deploy: Damage an Enemy and up to 4 other random Enemies with the same Power by 1.
Fresh Crew: Repeat the Deploy ability.

Ban Ard Tutor.name: Ban Ard Tutor
Ban Ard Tutor.info: Deploy: You may Mulligan a card, but choose a Bronze Spell or Alchemy card from your Deck to replace it. Then shuffle your Deck.

Barclay Els.name: Barclay Els
Barclay Els.info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze or Silver Dwarf from your Deck and Strengthen it by 3.

Battering Ram.name: Battering Ram
Battering Ram.info:
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 2. If it was Destroyed, Damage another Enemy by 3.
Fresh Crew: Increase the initial Damage by 1.

Bekker's Twisted Mirror.name: Bekker's Twisted Mirror
Bekker's Twisted Mirror.info: Damage the Highest Unit by an amount equal to its Power, but no more than 10 (ignoring Armor) and Boost the Lowest other Unit by the same amount.

Berserker Marauder.name: Berserker Marauder
Berserker Marauder.info:
Regressing.
Deploy: Strengthen self by 1 for each Damaged and for each Cursed Ally, then Damage self by 1.

Birna Bran.name: Birna Bran
Birna Bran.info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Apply a Skellige Storm Hazard to the opposite row.

Biting Frost.name: Biting Frost
Biting Frost.info:
Apply a Frost Hazard to an opposing row.
Frost Hazard: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Lowest Unit on the row by 2.

Black Infantry Arbalest.name: Black Infantry Arbalest
Black Infantry Arbalest.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If you have any Soldiers in your Hand, Damage it by 5 instead.

Bloodcurdling Roar.name: Bloodcurdling Roar
Bloodcurdling Roar.info:
Destroy an Ally.
Spawn a Bear.

Bloody Baron.name: Bloody Baron
Bloody Baron.info:
If this Unit is in your Deck at the end of the Round, place it on top.
Whenever an Enemy is Destroyed during a Round while this Unit is in your Deck, Boost it by 1.

Blue Mountain Commando.name: Blue Mountain Commando
Blue Mountain Commando.info:
Whenever this Unit is moved, Boost it by 2.
Deploy: Play all copies of this Unit from your Deck on the row.

Blue Stripes Commando.name: Blue Stripes Commando
Blue Stripes Commando.info: Whenever a different Temerian Ally with the same Power as this Unit is played, play this Unit from your Deck (1 copy max) on that Ally's row.

Blue Stripes Scout.name: Blue Stripes Scout
Blue Stripes Scout.info:
Deploy: Boost this Unit and all Bronze Loyal Temerian Units with the same Power in your Hand, Deck and on your side of the Board by 1.
Crewmen 1.

Blueboy Lugos.name: Blueboy Lugos
Blueboy Lugos.info: Deploy: Spawn a Spectral Whale on a random opposing row.

Botchling.name: Botchling
Botchling.info:
Deploy: Boost all Lubberkins in your Hand and Deck by 6.
Deathwish: Play a Lubberkin from your Deck.

Braenn.name: Braenn
Braenn.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by this Unit's Power. If it was Destroyed, Boost all Dryads and Ambush Units in your Hand and Deck by 1.

Brouver Hoog.name: Brouver Hoog
Brouver Hoog.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Play any Silver Unit or a Bronze Dwarf from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

Cahir.name: Cahir
Cahir.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: If playing as Nilfgaard, trigger your Leader's Deploy ability.

Cantarella.name: Cantarella
Cantarella.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Look at the top card from your Deck. Draw it, or place it at the bottom of your Deck and draw the new top card.

Caranthir.name: Caranthir
Caranthir.info: Deploy: Move an Enemy to this row on its side and apply a Frost Hazard to that row.

Caretaker.name: Caretaker
Caretaker.info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Unit from your opponent's Graveyard.

Catapult.name: Catapult
Catapult.info:
Deploy: Damage the Highest and Lowest Enemy on the opposite row by 2.
Fresh Crew: Increase the Damage dealt by 1.

Ceallach.name: Ceallach
Ceallach.info: Deploy: Spawn an Ambassador, Assassin or Emissary.

Celaeno Harpy.name: Celaeno Harpy
Celaeno Harpy.info: Deploy: Spawn 2 Harpy Eggs to the left.

Cerys.name: Cerys
Cerys.info: Counter 4: While in the Graveyard, decrease the Counter whenever a Unit is Resurrected on your side. When the Counter reaches 0, Resurrect self.

Champion of Champions.name: Champion of Champions
Champion of Champions.info:
If this Unit is alone on its row at the start of your turn, Strengthen it by 2.
Deploy: Gain 4 Armor.

Ciaran.name: Ciaran
Ciaran.info: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock and move it to this row on its side.

Ciri.name: Ciri
Ciri.info:
At the end of the Round, return this Unit to your Hand if you lost.
Deploy: Gain 3 Armor.

Ciri: Dash.name: Ciri: Dash
Ciri: Dash.info: When this Unit enters the Graveyard, Strengthen it by 3 and shuffle it back into your Deck.

Clan Brokvar Hunter.name: Clan Brokvar Hunter
Clan Brokvar Hunter.info:
Regressing.
Whenever a Unit adjacent to this one is Damaged, Strengthen self by 1.
Deploy: Damage a Unit by 4.

Clan Dimun Pirate.name: Clan Dimun Pirate
Clan Dimun Pirate.info: Deploy: Discard all copies of this Unit from your Deck.

Clan Dimun Pirate Captain.name: Clan Dimun Pirate Captain
Clan Dimun Pirate Captain.info: Every turn, at the end of your turn, if this Unit is in your Hand or Deck, Reset it and Boost it by the base Power of the  Highest Bronze Unit discarded to your Graveyard during your turn.

Clan Drummond Shieldmaiden.name: Clan Drummond Shieldmaiden
Clan Drummond Shieldmaiden.info: Deploy: Damage a Unit by 2. If it was already Damaged, play a copy of this Unit from your Deck.

Clan Drummond Warmonger.name: Clan Drummond Warmonger
Clan Drummond Warmonger.info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: You may Discard a Bronze card from your Deck.

Clan Tordarroch Armorsmith.name: Clan Tordarroch Armorsmith
Clan Tordarroch Armorsmith.info: Deploy: Heal 2 Allies and give them 3 Armor.

Clan Tordarroch Shieldsmith.name: Clan Tordarroch Shieldsmith
Clan Tordarroch Shieldsmith.info: Deploy: Strengthen an Ally by 2 and give it 2 Armor.

Clan Tuirseach Axeman.name: Clan Tuirseach Axeman
Clan Tuirseach Axeman.info:
Veteran 1.
Whenever an Enemy on the opposite row is Damaged, Boost self by 1.
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

Clan Tuirseach Skirmishers.name: Clan Tuirseach Skirmishers
Clan Tuirseach Skirmishers.info:
Veteran 1.
Whenever this Unit leaves the Graveyard, Strengthen it by 3.

Clan Tuirseach Veteran.name: Clan Tuirseach Veteran
Clan Tuirseach Veteran.info:
Veteran 1
Deploy: Trigger all your other Tuirseach Units' Veteran abilities, wherever they are.

Clan an Craite Greatsword.name: Clan an Craite Greatsword
Clan an Craite Greatsword.info: Every 2 turns, if this Unit is Damaged at the start of your turn, Reset it and Strengthen it by 2.

Clan an Craite Raider.name: Clan an Craite Raider
Clan an Craite Raider.info: Whenever this Unit is Discarded, Resurrect it immediately.

Clan an Craite Warcrier.name: Clan an Craite Warcrier
Clan an Craite Warcrier.info: Deploy: Boost 2 Damaged Allies by half their Power (rounding down).

Cockatrice.name: Cockatrice
Cockatrice.info:
Whenever an Ally with a Deathwish appears, Boost self by 2.
Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each Ally with a Deathwish.

Combat Engineer.name: Combat Engineer
Combat Engineer.info:
Deploy: Toggle a Bronze or Silver Unit's Resilience.
Crewmen 1.

Commando Neophyte.name: Commando Neophyte
Commando Neophyte.info: Whenever you draw a card to your Hand, Damage a random Enemy by 2.

Coral.name: Coral
Coral.info: Deploy: Transform a Bronze or Silver Unit into a Jade Figurine.

Crach an Craite.name: Crach an Craite
Crach an Craite.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Damage self by 1, then play the Highest Loyal Bronze or Silver Unit from your Deck and Strengthen it by 3, then, if it does not Damage itself, Damage it by 1.

Crone: Brewess.name: Crone: Brewess
Crone: Brewess.info: Deploy: Play all other Crones from your Deck.

Crone: Weavess.name: Crone: Weavess
Crone: Weavess.info: Deploy: Play all other Crones from your Deck.

Crone: Whispess.name: Crone: Whispess
Crone: Whispess.info: Deploy: Play all other Crones from your Deck.

Crow's Eye.name: Crow's Eye
Crow's Eye.info: Damage the Highest Enemy on each row by 4. Increase the Damage dealt by 1 for each copy of this card in your Graveyard, to a maximum of 10 Damage.

Cyclops.name: Cyclops
Cyclops.info: Deploy: Destroy an Ally and Damage an Enemy by the Destroyed Ally's Power. If the Destroyed Ally had a Deathwish, Strengthen self by 3.

Cynthia.name: Cynthia
Cynthia.info: Deploy: Reveal the Highest Unit in your opponent's Hand and Boost self by its Power.

Cyprian Wiley.name: Cyprian Wiley
Cyprian Wiley.info: Deploy: Weaken a Unit by 3 or Destroy a face-down Ambush Unit.

Daerlan Foot Soldiers.name: Daerlan Foot Soldiers
Daerlan Foot Soldiers.info: Whenever you Reveal this Unit in your Hand, play it and draw the top card from your Deck.

Dagon.name: Dagon
Dagon.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Spawn Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain.

Dandelion.name: Dandelion
Dandelion.info: Deploy: Boost up to 3 Units in your Deck by 2, then shuffle your Deck.

Decoy.name: Decoy
Decoy.info: Return a Bronze or Silver Ally to your Hand, Boost it by 3 and play it.

Dennis Cranmer.name: Dennis Cranmer
Dennis Cranmer.info: Deploy: Strengthen all other Dwarves in your Deck, Hand and on your side of the Board by 1.

Dethmold.name: Dethmold
Dethmold.info: Deploy: Spawn Torrential Rain, Clear Skies or Alzur's Thunder.

Dijkstra.name: Dijkstra
Dijkstra.info: Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your Deck.

Dimeritium Bomb.name: Dimeritium Bomb
Dimeritium Bomb.info: Choose 5 adjacent Units and Reset them. If any are Gold, Demote them first.

Dimeritium Shackles.name: Dimeritium Shackles
Dimeritium Shackles.info: Choose a Unit and toggle its Lock. If it is Gold, Demote it first. If it is an Enemy, Damage it by 2.

Djenge Frett.name: Djenge Frett
Djenge Frett.info: Deploy: Damage 2 Allies by 1 and Strengthen self by 2 for each.

Dol Blathanna Archer.name: Dol Blathanna Archer
Dol Blathanna Archer.info: Deploy: Damage Enemies by 3 and then 1.

Dol Blathanna Marksman.name: Dol Blathanna Marksman
Dol Blathanna Marksman.info:
Every time this Unit is moved, Damage a random Enemy by 2. Whenever an Enemy moves to a different row, Damage it by 2.
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 2.

Dol Blathanna Protector.name: Dol Blathanna Protector
Dol Blathanna Protector.info: Whenever you play a Special card, Boost self by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.

Dol Blathanna Swordmaster.name: Dol Blathanna Swordmaster
Dol Blathanna Swordmaster.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by this Unit's Power.

Dol Blathanna Trapper.name: Dol Blathanna Trapper
Dol Blathanna Trapper.info: Deploy: Spawn a Fireball Trap on an opposing row.

Donar an Hindar.name: Donar an Hindar
Donar an Hindar.info: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock. Move a Bronze Unit from your opponent's Graveyard to your Graveyard.

Dorregaray.name: Dorregaray
Dorregaray.info: Deploy: Spawn a Savage Bear, Wyvern, Ekimmara or Drowner.

Draig Bon–Dhu.name: Draig Bon–Dhu
Draig Bon–Dhu.info: Deploy: Strengthen up to 2 Units in your Graveyard by 3.

Draug.name: Draug
Draug.info: Deploy: Spawn a Draugir on a random row on the side of each player with at least one Bronze or Silver Card in their Graveyard.

Drought.name: Drought
Drought.info:
Apply a Drought Hazard to all opposing rows.
Drought Hazard: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Lowest Unit on the row by 2.

Drowner.name: Drowner
Drowner.info: Deploy: Move a Unit to this row on its side. If it's an Enemy, Damage it by 2. If the Enemy is under any Hazard after being moved, Damage it by 4 instead.

Dudu.name: Dudu
Dudu.info: Deploy: Choose an Enemy and copy its Power.

Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry.name: Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry
Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry.info: Deploy: Remove Armor from a Unit and Boost self by the amount of Armor removed.

Dun Banner Light Cavalry.name: Dun Banner Light Cavalry
Dun Banner Light Cavalry.info: If at the start of your turn you have not passed and are losing the Round by more than 20 Power, play this Unit from your Deck.

Dwarven Agitator.name: Dwarven Agitator
Dwarven Agitator.info: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a random different Bronze Dwarf from your Deck.

Dwarven Mercenary.name: Dwarven Mercenary
Dwarven Mercenary.info: Deploy: Move a Unit on another row to this row on its side. If it's an Ally, Boost it by 3.

Dwarven Skirmisher.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
Dwarven Skirmisher.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was not Destroyed, Strengthen self by 2.

Earth Elemental.name: Earth Elemental
Earth Elemental.info:
Deploy: Give this Unit a Shield.
Deathwish: Spawn 2 Lesser Earth Elementals at the end of the row.

Eithné.name: Eithné
Eithné.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Special card.

Ekimmara.name: Ekimmara
Ekimmara.info: Deploy: Gain Resilience and Consume an Ally.

Ele'yas.name: Ele'yas
Ele'yas.info: Whenever you draw or Mulligan this Unit, Boost it by 2.

Elven Mercenary.name: Elven Mercenary
Elven Mercenary.info: Deploy: Look at the top 2 Bronze Special cards from your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.

Elven Wardancer.name: Elven Wardancer
Elven Wardancer.info: Whenever you Mulligan this Unit, play it from your Deck immediately.

Emhyr var Emreis.name: Emhyr var Emreis
Emhyr var Emreis.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Play a card from your Hand, then return a Bronze or Silver Ally to your Hand.

Emissary.name: Emissary
Emissary.info: Deploy: Look at the top 2 Bronze Units from your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.

Eredin.name: Eredin
Eredin.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Spawn a Bronze Wild Hunt Unit.

Ermion.name: Ermion
Ermion.info: Deploy: Draw the top 2 cards from your Deck, then Discard 2 cards from your Hand.

Eskel.name: Eskel
Eskel.info: Deploy: Destroy a Bronze or Silver Enemy that is not Boosted.

Expired Ale.name: Expired Ale
Expired Ale.info: Transform into Foul Ale, move to your opponent's Hand and Reveal.

Fake Ciri.name: Fake Ciri
Fake Ciri.info:
If this Unit is Spying at the start of your turn, Boost it by 1. If it is Spying when your opponent passes, move it to the opposite side.
Deploy: When you play this Unit on your side, Strengthen it by 3.

Farseer.name: Farseer
Farseer.info: If a different Ally or Unit in your Hand is Boosted during your turn, Boost self by 2 at the end of the turn.

Field Medic.name: Field Medic
Field Medic.info: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Ally and shuffle it back into your Deck, then play a random Bronze Unit from your Deck.

Fiend.name: Fiend
Fiend.info: Deploy: If you have any Relicts in your Hand, Strengthen self by 3.

Fire Scorpion.name: Fire Scorpion
Fire Scorpion.info:
Whenever you Reveal this Unit in your Hand, trigger its Deploy ability.
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4.

Foglet.name: Foglet
Foglet.info: Whenever you apply a Fog Hazard, play 1 copy of this Unit from your Deck on the opposite row. If there are none, Resurrect 1 copy instead. Destroy when all Fog Hazards are cleared from the Board.

Foltest.name: Foltest
Foltest.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Boost all other Units in your Hand, Deck and on your side of the Board (except Agents and Double Agents) by 1.
Crewmen 1.

Francesca.name: Francesca
Francesca.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: You may Mulligan a card, but choose any card from your Deck to replace it. If the replacement card's a Unit, Boost it by 3. Then shuffle your Deck.

Frightener.name: Frightener
Frightener.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Move a Unit on another row on this side to this row. Draw the top card from your Deck.

Fringilla Vigo.name: Fringilla Vigo
Fringilla Vigo.info: Deploy: If Spying, set own base Power to 1. Set the Power of the Unit on the right to that of the Unit on the left.

Full Moon Potion.name: Full Moon Potion
Full Moon Potion.info: Boost up to 6 random Allies by 2.

Gaunter O'Dimm.name: Gaunter O'Dimm
Gaunter O'Dimm.info: Deploy: Guess whether a random Unit from your opponent's Deck is Higher or Lower than 5. Success: Play any card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back. Failure: Your opponent draws the top card from their Deck. Tie: Both players draw the top card from their Deck.

Ge'els.name: Ge'els
Ge'els.info: Deploy: Look at the top Gold card and top Silver card from your Deck. Play 1 and return the other to the top of your Deck.

Gedyneith Flaminica.name: Gedyneith Flaminica
Gedyneith Flaminica.info: Deploy: Clear Hazards from the row and move 2 Allies to it.

Geralt: Aard.name: Geralt: Aard
Geralt: Aard.info: Deploy: Choose 3 Enemies, push them to the row above them (if possible) and Damage them by 3.

Geralt: Igni.name: Geralt: Igni
Geralt: Igni.info: Deploy: Destroy all the Highest Units on the opposite row if that row totals 25 or more Power.

Germain of Fox Hollow.name: Germain of Fox Hollow
Germain of Fox Hollow.info: Deploy: Spawn 2 Cows to the right and 2 Cows to the left.

Ghoul.name: Ghoul
Ghoul.info: Deploy: Consume a Bronze or Silver Unit from your Graveyard.

Gremist.name: Gremist
Gremist.info: Deploy: Spawn Impenetrable Fog, Clear Skies or Bloodcurdling Roar.

Griffin.name: Griffin
Griffin.info: Deploy: Trigger the Deathwish of a Bronze Ally.

Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream.name: Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream
Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream.info: Deploy: Spawn a copy of a Gold card from your opponent's Graveyard and, if it's a Unit (but not an Agent or Double Agent), Boost it by 2.

Harald Houndsnout.name: Harald Houndsnout
Harald Houndsnout.info: Deploy: Spawn Wilfred to the left, Wilhelm to the right and Wilmar on the opposite row.

Harald the Cripple.name: Harald the Cripple
Harald the Cripple.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Lowest Enemy on the opposite row by 1 (ignoring Armor).
Deploy: Damage a random Enemy on the opposite row by 2 (ignoring Armor). Repeat 4 times.

Harpy.name: Harpy
Harpy.info:
Whenever a Beast Ally is Destroyed during your turn, play 1 copy of this Unit from your Deck.
Deploy: Damage the Lowest Enemy by 1.

Hattori.name: Hattori
Hattori.info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Scoia'tael Unit with Power less than or equal to this Unit's.

Hawker Smuggler.name: Hawker Smuggler
Hawker Smuggler.info: Whenever an Enemy appears, Boost self by 1.

Hawker Support.name: Hawker Support
Hawker Support.info: Deploy: Boost a Unit in your Hand by 3.

Hefty Helge.name: Hefty Helge
Hefty Helge.info: Deploy: If this Unit was Revealed, Damage all Enemies by 1. Otherwise, Damage all Enemies except those on the opposite row by 1.

Henselt.name: Henselt
Henselt.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Choose a Bronze Support, Machine or Kaedweni Ally. Play all copies of it from your Deck.
Crewmen 1.

Herbalist.name: Herbalist
Herbalist.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Play a random Bronze Organic or Hazard card from your Deck.

Heymaey Battle Maiden.name: Heymaey Battle Maiden
Heymaey Battle Maiden.info: Deploy: Damage a Machine or Soldier Ally by 1 and play a copy of it from your Deck.

Hjalmar.name: Hjalmar
Hjalmar.info: Deploy: Spawn the Lord of Undvik on the leftmost side of the opposite row.

Holger Blackhand.name: Holger Blackhand
Holger Blackhand.info: Deploy: Damage a Unit by 5. If it was Destroyed, Strengthen the Highest Unit in your Graveyard by 3.

Ice Giant.name: Ice Giant
Ice Giant.info: If a Frost Hazard is anywhere on the Board, Boost self by 6.

Ida Emean.name: Ida Emean
Ida Emean.info: Deploy: Spawn Impenetrable Fog, Clear Skies or Overdose.

Imlerith.name: Imlerith
Imlerith.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4. If the Enemy is under a Frost Hazard, Damage it by 8 instead.

Impenetrable Fog.name: Impenetrable Fog
Impenetrable Fog.info:
Apply a Fog Hazard to an opposing row.
Fog Hazard: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Highest Unit on the row by 2.

Impera Brigade.name: Impera Brigade
Impera Brigade.info:
Whenever a Spying Enemy appears, Boost self by 2.
Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each Spying Enemy.

Impera Enforcers.name: Impera Enforcers
Impera Enforcers.info:
Whenever a Spying Enemy appears during your turn, Damage an Enemy by 2.
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 2.

Imperial Golem.name: Imperial Golem
Imperial Golem.info: Whenever you Reveal a card in your opponent's Hand, play this Unit from your Deck (1 copy per card revealed).

Infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
Infiltrator.info: Deploy: Toggle another Unit's Spying token.

Iorveth.name: Iorveth
Iorveth.info: Deploy:  Damage an Enemy by 7. If it was Destroyed, Boost all Elves in your Hand by 1.

Iris.name: Iris
Iris.info: Deathwish: Boost 5 random Units on the other side of the Board by 5.

Isengrim.name: Isengrim
Isengrim.info: Play a Bronze or Silver Ambush card from your Deck.

Ithlinne.name: Ithlinne
Ithlinne.info: Deploy: Play a Bronze Spell, Boon or Hazard card from your Deck, then Spawn a copy of it. Shuffle the others back.

Joachim de Wett.name: Joachim de Wett
Joachim de Wett.info: Deploy: Play the top Loyal Bronze or Silver Unit from your Deck and Boost it by 10.

John Calveit.name: John Calveit
John Calveit.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards from your Deck and play 1.

John Natalis.name: John Natalis
John Natalis.info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Tactics card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

Johnny.name: Johnny
Johnny.info: Deploy: You may Discard a card from your Hand and create a base copy in your Hand of a random card of the same color in your opponent's Deck (if there are any - if not, keep your card).

Jotunn.name: Jotunn
Jotunn.info: Deploy: Move 3 Enemies to this row on their side and Damage them by 2. If that row is affected by a Frost Hazard, Damage them by 3 instead.

Kaedweni Sergeant.name: Kaedweni Sergeant
Kaedweni Sergeant.info:
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor and clear Hazards from the row on your side.
Crewmen 1.

Kaedweni Siege Master.name: Kaedweni Siege Master
Kaedweni Siege Master.info:
Deploy: Heal a Bronze or Silver Northern Realms Machine and trigger its Deploy ability.
Crewmen 1.

Kaedweni Siege Support.name: Kaedweni Siege Support
Kaedweni Siege Support.info:
Whenever an Ally appears, Boost it by 1. If it's a Machine, Boost it by 1 and add 1 Armor.
Crewmen 1.

Katakan.name: Katakan
Katakan.info: Deploy: Consume a Bronze or Silver Unit from either Graveyard.

Kayran.name: Kayran
Kayran.info: Deploy: Consume a Unit with 6 or less Power. If there is no eligible Unit, Boost self by 8.

Keira Metz.name: Keira Metz
Keira Metz.info: Deploy: Spawn Aeromancy, Epidemic or Thunderbolt Potion.

King Bran.name: King Bran
King Bran.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Veteran 1
Deploy: Discard up to 3 cards from your Deck and Strengthen all Units among them by 1. Then shuffle your Deck.

King of Beggars.name: King of Beggars
King of Beggars.info:
Regressing.
Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self enough to tie the Round or to a maximum of 15 base Power.

Lacerate.name: Lacerate
Lacerate.info: Damage all Units on a row by 3.

Lambert.name: Lambert
Lambert.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 5 and Damage up to 4 copies of it on its side by 4.

Leo Bonhart.name: Leo Bonhart
Leo Bonhart.info: Deploy: You may Reveal a Unit in your Hand and Damage an Enemy by its base Power.

Letho of Gulet.name: Letho of Gulet
Letho of Gulet.info: Deploy: If Spying, set own base Power to 1. Destroy Units adjacent to this one and Boost self by their Power.

Light Longship.name: Light Longship
Light Longship.info:
Regressing.
Deploy: Damage the Unit to the right by 1, then Strengthen self by 2.
Every turn, at the start of your turn, repeat the Deploy ability.

Lubberkin.name: Lubberkin
Lubberkin.info:
Deploy: Boost all Botchlings in your Hand and Deck by 6.
Deathwish: Play a Botchling from your Deck.

Madman Lugos.name: Madman Lugos
Madman Lugos.info: Deploy: Discard a Bronze Unit from your Deck and Damage a Unit by the Discarded Unit's base Power.

Magne Division.name: Magne Division
Magne Division.info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, draw the top card from your Deck and create a base copy of the top Bronze card in your opponent's Deck that they then draw immediately.

Mahakam Ale.name: Mahakam Ale
Mahakam Ale.info: Deploy: Boost a random Ally on each row by 4.

Mahakam Guard.name: Mahakam Guard
Mahakam Guard.info: Deploy: Boost an Ally by 4. If it's a Dwarf, Strengthen it by 3 instead.

Mahakam Marauder.name: Mahakam Marauder
Mahakam Marauder.info: Whenever this Unit is Boosted, Damaged, Strengthened or Weakened, Boost it by 2.

Mahakam Pyrotechnician.name: Mahakam Pyrotechnician
Mahakam Pyrotechnician.info: Deploy: Damage a random Enemy on each row by 3.

Malena.name: Malena
Malena.info:
Every turn, at the start of your turn, move a random Unit on another row on this side to this row.
Deploy: Gain 3 Armor.

Mandrake.name: Mandrake
Mandrake.info: Spawn Mandrake Root Extract or Mandrake Cordial.

Mangonel.name: Mangonel
Mangonel.info: Whenever you Reveal a card in either player's Hand, Damage a random Enemy by 2.

Marching Orders.name: Marching Orders
Marching Orders.info: Boost the Lowest Bronze or Silver Unit from your Deck by 2 and play it.

Margarita Laux–Antille.name: Margarita Laux–Antille
Margarita Laux–Antille.info: Deploy: Reset a Unit and toggle its Lock.

Menno Coehoorn.name: Menno Coehoorn
Menno Coehoorn.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4. If it is Spying, Destroy it.

Merigold's Hailstorm.name: Merigold's Hailstorm
Merigold's Hailstorm.info: Damage all Bronze and Silver Units on a row by half their Power (rounding up and ignoring Armor).

Milva.name: Milva
Milva.info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, return the Highest different Bronze or Silver Enemy to your opponent's Hand, then return the Highest different Bronze or Silver Ally to your Hand and Boost it by 3.

Monster Nest.name: Monster Nest
Monster Nest.info: Spawn a Bronze Necrophage or Insectoid Unit and Boost it by 3.

Morenn.name: Morenn
Morenn.info: Ambush: When an Enemy is played (except Leaders), turn this Unit over and Damage that Enemy by 5 before its Deploy ability resolves (but after it gains Armor).

Morkvarg.name: Morkvarg
Morkvarg.info: Whenever this Unit is Discarded or Destroyed, Resurrect it and Weaken it by half its Power (rounding up).

Morvran Voorhis.name: Morvran Voorhis
Morvran Voorhis.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Reveal up to 4 cards.

Morvudd.name: Morvudd
Morvudd.info: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock. If it's an Enemy, Damage it by half its Power (rounding up and ignoring Armor).

Mourntart.name: Mourntart
Mourntart.info:
After 1 turn, at the start of your turn, Consume all Bronze and Silver Units in your Graveyard, but only Boost self by 1 for each.
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

Muzzle.name: Muzzle
Muzzle.info: Move a Bronze or Silver Enemy with 8 Power or less to the opposite row.

Myrgtabrakke.name: Myrgtabrakke
Myrgtabrakke.info: Deploy: Damage Units by 2, 2 and then 1.

Nature's Gift.name: Nature's Gift
Nature's Gift.info: Play a Bronze or Silver Special card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

Nauzicaa Brigade.name: Nauzicaa Brigade
Nauzicaa Brigade.info: Deploy: Damage a Spying Unit by 7. If it was Destroyed, Strengthen self by 4.

Nauzicaa Standard Bearer.name: Nauzicaa Standard Bearer
Nauzicaa Standard Bearer.info: Deploy: Clear Hazards from the row on your side and Boost 1 Ally or Revealed Unit in your Hand by 3.

Necromancy.name: Necromancy
Necromancy.info: Banish a Bronze or Silver Unit from either Graveyard and Boost a Bronze or Silver Ally by its Power.

Nekker.name: Nekker
Nekker.info:
Whenever an Ally Consumes a card, Boost this Unit by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.
Deathwish: Play a copy of this Unit from your Deck.

Nekker Warrior.name: Nekker Warrior
Nekker Warrior.info: Deploy: Choose a Bronze Ally and create 2 base copies of it on the bottom of your Deck.

Nekurat.name: Nekurat
Nekurat.info: Deploy: Consume a Bronze or Silver Unit from either Graveyard.

Nenneke.name: Nenneke
Nenneke.info: Deploy: Shuffle up to 3 Bronze or Silver Units from your Graveyard into your Deck.

Nilfgaardian Knight.name: Nilfgaardian Knight
Nilfgaardian Knight.info: Deploy: Gain 2 Armor. Reveal a random card from your Hand.

Nilfgaardian Standard Bearer.name: Nilfgaardian Standard Bearer
Nilfgaardian Standard Bearer.info:
Whenever you play a Soldier from your Hand, Boost an Ally by 2.
Deploy: Boost an Ally by 2.

Nithral.name: Nithral
Nithral.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 5. If you have any Wild Hunt Units in your Hand, Damage it by 7 instead.

Ocvist.name: Ocvist
Ocvist.info: After 4 turns, at the start of your turn, Damage all Enemies by 1, return this Unit to your Hand and transform it into Exhausted Ocvist.

Odrin.name: Odrin
Odrin.info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, move this Unit to a random row on its side and Boost all other Units on it by 1.

Old Speartip: Asleep.name: Old Speartip: Asleep
Old Speartip: Asleep.info:
If at the start of your turn there are 3 or more Units on the opposite row, wake up.
Deploy: Gain 5 Armor. Boost Units adjacent to this one by 1.

Olgierd.name: Olgierd
Olgierd.info: When this Unit is Discarded or Destroyed, Weaken it by half (rounding up). At the start of Rounds 2 and 3, Resurrect this Unit if it is in the Graveyard.

Operator.name: Operator
Operator.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: If neither player has passed, choose a Bronze Unit in your Hand and create a base copy of it in both players' Hands.

Overdose.name: Overdose
Overdose.info: Damage up to 6 random Enemies by 2.

Pavetta.name: Pavetta
Pavetta.info: Deploy: If neither player has passed, shuffle the Lowest different Bronze or Silver Ally into your Deck, then shuffle the Lowest different Bronze or Silver Enemy into your opponent's Deck.

Peter Saar Gwynleve.name: Peter Saar Gwynleve
Peter Saar Gwynleve.info: Deploy: Reset a Unit. If it's an Ally, Strengthen it by 3. If it's an Enemy, Weaken it by 3.

Philippa Eilhart.name: Philippa Eilhart
Philippa Eilhart.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 5, then Damage random Enemies by 4, 3, 2 and 1. The same Enemy cannot be Damaged twice in a row.

Poor Flanking Infantry.name: Poor Flanking Infantry
Poor Flanking Infantry.info: Deploy: Spawn Left Flanking Infantry to the left and Right Flanking Infantry to the right.

Priestess of Freya.name: Priestess of Freya
Priestess of Freya.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Unit.

Prince Stennis.name: Prince Stennis
Prince Stennis.info: Deploy: Gain 3 Armor. Play the top Loyal Bronze or Silver Unit from your Deck and give it 5 Armor.

Priscilla.name: Priscilla
Priscilla.info:
Counter 4: Until the Counter reaches 0, at the end of your turn, Boost a random other Ally by 3 and decrease the Counter.
Deploy: Gain 3 Armor.

Prize-Winning Cow.name: Prize-Winning Cow
Prize-Winning Cow.info:
Doomed.
Retaliation: Spawn a Chort on the row.
Deathwish: Spawn a Chort on the row.

Queensguard.name: Queensguard
Queensguard.info: Deploy: Resurrect all copies of this Unit.

Quen Sign.name: Quen Sign
Quen Sign.info: Choose a Bronze or Silver Unit in your Hand. Give all copies of it in your Hand and Deck a Shield and Boost them by 2. Units which already have a Shield cannot be chosen and aren't affected.

Radovid.name: Radovid
Radovid.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Toggle 2 Units' Lock. If Enemies, Damage them by 4 as well.
Crewmen 1.

Ragh Nar Roog.name: Ragh Nar Roog
Ragh Nar Roog.info:
Apply a Ragh Nar Roog Hazard to all opposing rows.
Ragh Nar Roog Hazard: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Highest Unit on the row by 2.

Raging Berserker.name: Raging Berserker
Raging Berserker.info: Retaliation: Transform into a Raging Bear.

Rainfarn.name: Rainfarn
Rainfarn.info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Disloyal Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

Reaver Hunter.name: Reaver Hunter
Reaver Hunter.info: Deploy or Bond: Boost all copies of this Unit in your Hand, Deck and on your side of the Board by 1.

Reaver Scout.name: Reaver Scout
Reaver Scout.info: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Ally and play a copy of it from your Deck.

Redanian Elite.name: Redanian Elite
Redanian Elite.info:
Whenever this Unit's Armor reaches 0, Boost self by 5.
Deploy: Gain 4 Armor.

Redanian Knight.name: Redanian Knight
Redanian Knight.info: If this Unit has no Armor at the start of your turn,  Boost it by 2 and add 2 Armor to it.

Redanian Knight-Elect.name: Redanian Knight-Elect
Redanian Knight-Elect.info:
If this Unit has Armor at the start of your turn, Boost Units adjacent to it by 1.
Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

Regis.name: Regis
Regis.info: Deploy: Weaken a Unit by half its base Power (rounding up) and Boost self by half its base Power (rounding down).

Regis: Higher Vampire.name: Regis: Higher Vampire
Regis: Higher Vampire.info: Deploy: Look at 3 Bronze Units from your opponent's Deck. Consume 1, but Boost self by its base Power instead.

Reinforced Ballista.name: Reinforced Ballista
Reinforced Ballista.info:
Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 2.
Fresh Crew: Repeat the Deploy ability.

Reinforced Siege Tower.name: Reinforced Siege Tower
Reinforced Siege Tower.info:
Deploy: Boost self by 2.
Fresh Crew: Repeat the Deploy ability.

Reinforced Trebuchet.name: Reinforced Trebuchet
Reinforced Trebuchet.info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage a random Enemy by 1 (ignoring Armor).

Reinforcement.name: Reinforcement
Reinforcement.info: Play a Bronze or Silver Soldier, Machine, Officer or Support Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

Restore.name: Restore
Restore.info: Return a Bronze or Silver Skellige Unit from your Graveyard to your Hand and set its base Power to 10, then play a card from your Hand.

Roach.name: Roach
Roach.info: Whenever you play a Gold card from your Hand (note: does not include Leaders), play this Unit from your Deck on a random row before that card resolves.

Ronvid of Small Marsh.name: Ronvid of Small Marsh
Ronvid of Small Marsh.info:
Whenever this Unit is Discarded or Destroyed, set its base Power to 1 and Resurrect it on a random row.
Crewmen 1.

Rot Tosser.name: Rot Tosser
Rot Tosser.info: Deploy: Spawn a Cow Carcass on an opposing row.

Rotfiend.name: Rotfiend
Rotfiend.info: Deathwish: Damage all Units on the opposite row by 2.

Royal Decree.name: Royal Decree
Royal Decree.info: Play a Gold card from your Deck. If it is a Unit (but not an Agent or Double Agent), Boost it by 2. Shuffle the others back.

Sabrina Glevissig.name: Sabrina Glevissig
Sabrina Glevissig.info: Deathwish: Set all Units on the row to the Power of the Lowest Unit on the row.

Saesenthessis.name: Saesenthessis
Saesenthessis.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Dwarf Ally. Damage an Enemy by the number of Elf Allies.

Sage.name: Sage
Sage.info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Alchemy or Spell card and Banish it.

Sarah.name: Sarah
Sarah.info: Deploy: You may Mulligan a card, but draw a card of the same color to replace it.

Saskia.name: Saskia
Saskia.info: Deploy: Mulligan up to 2 cards, but choose any Bronze cards from your Deck to replace them. Then shuffle your Deck.

Savage Bear.name: Savage Bear
Savage Bear.info: After an Enemy is played from any Hand and its Deploy ability resolves, Damage it by 1.

Schirrú.name: Schirrú
Schirrú.info: Deploy: You may transform a card from your Hand into Scorch.

School of the Wolf: Eskel.name: School of the Wolf: Eskel
School of the Wolf: Eskel.info: Deploy: Play all other School of the Wolf Witchers from your Deck.

School of the Wolf: Lambert.name: School of the Wolf: Lambert
School of the Wolf: Lambert.info: Deploy: Play all other School of the Wolf Witchers from your Deck.

School of the Wolf: Vesemir.name: School of the Wolf: Vesemir
School of the Wolf: Vesemir.info: Deploy: Play all other School of the Wolf Witchers from your Deck.

Serrit.name: Serrit
Serrit.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 6 or set a Revealed opposing Unit's Power to 1.

Shadow.name: Shadow
Shadow.info: Deploy: Play a Bronze Monster Deathwish Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

Shani.name: Shani
Shani.info: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Unit and add 2 Armor to it.

She-Troll of Vergen.name: She-Troll of Vergen
She-Troll of Vergen.info: Deploy: Consume a Bronze Deathwish Unit from your Deck, but without Boosting, and trigger that Deathwish.

Sheldon Skaggs.name: Sheldon Skaggs
Sheldon Skaggs.info: Deploy: Move all Units on the row to random rows on the same side and Boost self by 1 for each.

Sigrdrifa.name: Sigrdrifa
Sigrdrifa.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze or Silver Unit.

Skellige Storm.name: Skellige Storm
Skellige Storm.info:
Apply a Skellige Storm Hazard to an opposing row.
Skellige Storm Hazard: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the leftmost units on the row by 2, 1 and 1, respectively.

Skjall.name: Skjall
Skjall.info: Deploy: Play a random Bronze or Silver Cursed Unit from your Deck.

Slyzard.name: Slyzard
Slyzard.info: Deploy: Consume, but without Boosting, a different Unit from your Graveyard that has a copy in your Deck and play that copy.

Spotter.name: Spotter
Spotter.info: Deploy: Choose a Revealed Unit in either Hand and Boost self by its base Power.

Stammelford's Tremors.name: Stammelford's Tremors
Stammelford's Tremors.info: Damage all Units by 1. If any were Destroyed, Spawn a Lesser Guardian on your side.

Stefan Skellen.name: Stefan Skellen
Stefan Skellen.info: Deploy: Choose any card from your Deck and place it on top. If it is a Loyal Unit, Boost it by 2. Then shuffle the rest of your Deck.

Succubus.name: Succubus
Succubus.info: After 2 turns, at the start of your turn, move the Highest Unit on the opposite row to your side.

art.artist: Bartłomiej Gaweł, Alicja Kapustka, Bogna Gawrońska

Summoning Circle.name: Summoning Circle
Summoning Circle.info:
Doomed.
Spawn a base copy of the last Bronze or Silver Unit any player placed on the Board. Leaders cannot be copied.

Svanrige.name: Svanrige
Svanrige.info:
Veteran 1.
Deploy: Draw the top card from your Deck, then Discard a card from your Hand.

Sweers.name: Sweers
Sweers.info: Deploy: Choose an Enemy or a Revealed opposing Unit and move all copies of it from your opponent's Deck to their Graveyard. Weaken self by 1 for each card moved.

Síle de Tansarville.name: Síle de Tansarville
Síle de Tansarville.info: Deploy: You may play a Bronze Special card from your Hand and draw the top card from your Deck.

Temerian Drummer.name: Temerian Drummer
Temerian Drummer.info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost a random other Ally by 1.

Temerian Infantryman.name: Temerian Infantryman
Temerian Infantryman.info: Deploy: Play all copies of this Unit from your Deck on the row.

Thaler.name: Thaler
Thaler.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Look at the top 2 cards from your Deck. Draw 1 and shuffle the other back.

The Guardian.name: The Guardian
The Guardian.info: Deathwish: Create 2 Lesser Guardians on the top of your opponent's Deck.

The Last Wish.name: The Last Wish
The Last Wish.info: Look at the top 2 cards from your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.

Thunderbolt Potion.name: Thunderbolt Potion
Thunderbolt Potion.info: Add 2 Armor to 3 adjacent Units and Boost them by 3.

Tibor Eggebracht.name: Tibor Eggebracht
Tibor Eggebracht.info:
Regressing.
Deploy: If neither player has passed, Strengthen self by 15, then your opponent draws the top Bronze card from their Deck and Reveals it.

Toad Prince.name: Toad Prince
Toad Prince.info: Deploy: Draw the top card from your Deck, then Consume a card in your Hand. If it is a Special card, Boost self by 5.

Torrential Rain.name: Torrential Rain
Torrential Rain.info:
Apply a Rain Hazard to an opposing row.
Rain: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage up to 2 random Units on the row by 1.

Toruviel.name: Toruviel
Toruviel.info: Ambush: When your opponent passes, turn this Unit over and Boost 2 Units on each side by 2.

Treason.name: Treason
Treason.info: Move a Bronze Spying Enemy with 10 Power or less to the opposite row.

Trebuchet.name: Trebuchet
Trebuchet.info:
Deploy: Damage 3 adjacent Enemies by 1.
Fresh Crew: Increase the Damage dealt by 1.

Tridam Infantryman.name: Tridam Infantryman
Tridam Infantryman.info: Deploy: Gain 3 Armor. If you have any Soldiers in your Hand, gain 4 Armor and Boost self by 2 instead.

Triss: Butterfly Spell.name: Triss: Butterfly Spell
Triss: Butterfly Spell.info:
Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost all other Lowest Allies by 1.
Revenge: Boost all other Lowest Allies by 2.

Trollololo.name: Trollololo
Trollololo.info:
Every turn, at the start of your turn, gain 2 Armor.
Deploy: Gain 4 Armor.

Udalryk.name: Udalryk
Udalryk.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Look at the top 2 cards from your Deck. Draw one and Discard the other.

Unseen Elder.name: Unseen Elder
Unseen Elder.info:
Doomed, Stubborn.
Deploy: Consume an Ally, but Strengthen instead of Boosting. Repeat 2 times.

Vabjorn.name: Vabjorn
Vabjorn.info: Deploy: Damage a Unit by 2. If it was already Damaged, Destroy it instead.

Vanhemar.name: Vanhemar
Vanhemar.info: Deploy: Spawn Biting Frost, Clear Skies or Overdose.

Vattier de Rideaux.name: Vattier de Rideaux
Vattier de Rideaux.info: Deploy: Reveal up to 2 cards from your Hand. For each, Reveal 1 random card from your opponent's Hand.

Venendal Elite.name: Venendal Elite
Venendal Elite.info: Deploy: Choose a Revealed card. If it's a Unit, copy its Power, then set that Unit's Power to 1. If it's a Special card, Boost self by 9.

Vernon Roche.name: Vernon Roche
Vernon Roche.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was Destroyed, Spawn a Blue Stripes Commando on a random row and repeat the Deploy ability (one time only).

Ves.name: Ves
Ves.info: Deploy: You may Mulligan a card. If you have a Soldier or an Officer in your Hand, Mulligan up to 2 cards instead. If you have both, Mulligan up to 3 cards instead.

Vesemir.name: Vesemir
Vesemir.info: Deploy: Play a Bronze or Silver Alchemy card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

Vicovaro Medic.name: Vicovaro Medic
Vicovaro Medic.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Unit from your opponent's Graveyard.

Vicovaro Novice.name: Vicovaro Novice
Vicovaro Novice.info: Deploy: Look at the top 2 Bronze Alchemy cards from your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.

Vilgefortz.name: Vilgefortz
Vilgefortz.info: Deploy: Destroy an Ally or (only possible if your opponent has not passed) an Enemy. If you Destroy an Ally, play the top card from your Deck. If you Destroy an Enemy, your opponent draws the top Bronze card from their Deck and Reveals it.

Villentretenmerth.name: Villentretenmerth
Villentretenmerth.info:
After 3 turns, at the start of your turn, Destroy all the other Highest Units on the Board.
Deploy: Gain 3 Armor.

Vran Warrior.name: Vran Warrior
Vran Warrior.info:
Deploy: Consume the Unit to the right.
Every 2 turns, at the start of your turn, Consume the Unit to the right.

Vrihedd Brigade.name: Vrihedd Brigade
Vrihedd Brigade.info: Deploy: Clear Hazards from the row on your side and move a Unit to this row on its side.

Vrihedd Dragoon.name: Vrihedd Dragoon
Vrihedd Dragoon.info: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost a random Loyal Unit in your Hand by 1.

Vrihedd Officer.name: Vrihedd Officer
Vrihedd Officer.info: Deploy: You may Mulligan a card and Boost self by the Mulliganed card's base Power (or by 5 if it's a Special card).

Vrihedd Sappers.name: Vrihedd Sappers
Vrihedd Sappers.info: Ambush: After 2 turns, at the start of your turn, turn this Unit over.

Vrihedd Vanguard.name: Vrihedd Vanguard
Vrihedd Vanguard.info:
Whenever you Mulligan this Unit, Boost all Elf Allies by 1.
Deploy: Boost all other Elf Allies by 1.

War Longship.name: War Longship
War Longship.info: Whenever you Discard a Unit, Damage a random Enemy by 2.

Whale Harpooner.name: Whale Harpooner
Whale Harpooner.info: Deploy: Move an Enemy to this row on its side and Damage it by the number of other Units on that row.

White Frost.name: White Frost
White Frost.info:
Apply a Frost Hazard to 2 adjacent opposing rows.
Frost Hazard: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Lowest Unit on the row by 2.

Wild Boar of the Sea.name: Wild Boar of the Sea
Wild Boar of the Sea.info:
Every turn, at the start of your turn, Strengthen the Unit to the left by 1 and Damage the Unit to the right by 1.
Deploy: Gain 5 Armor.

Wild Hunt Hound.name: Wild Hunt Hound
Wild Hunt Hound.info: Deploy: Play a Biting Frost card from your Deck.

Wild Hunt Longship.name: Wild Hunt Longship
Wild Hunt Longship.info: While on the Board, Boost all other Wild Hunt Allies by 1. When Destroyed or Locked, Damage all other Wild Hunt Allies by 1.

Wild Hunt Navigator.name: Wild Hunt Navigator
Wild Hunt Navigator.info: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Wild Hunt Ally. Play a copy of it from your Deck.

Wild Hunt Rider.name: Wild Hunt Rider
Wild Hunt Rider.info: Increase by 1 the Damage dealt by Frost Hazards on the opposite row.

Wild Hunt Warrior.name: Wild Hunt Warrior
Wild Hunt Warrior.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was under a Frost Hazard or Destroyed, Boost self by 2.

Witch Hunter.name: Witch Hunter
Witch Hunter.info: Deploy: Reset a Unit. If it's a Mage, play a copy of this Unit from your Deck.

Wolfsbane.name: Wolfsbane
Wolfsbane.info: While in your Graveyard, after 3 turns, at the start of your turn, Boost the Lowest Ally by 6 and Damage the Highest Enemy by 6.

Woodland Spirit.name: Woodland Spirit
Woodland Spirit.info: Deploy: Spawn 3 Rabid Wolves and apply a Fog Hazard to the opposite row.

Wyvern.name: Wyvern
Wyvern.info: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If you have any Draconids in your Hand, Strengthen self by 2.

Xarthisius.name: Xarthisius
Xarthisius.info: Deploy: Look at your opponent's Deck. You may move a card to the bottom.

Yaevinn.name: Yaevinn
Yaevinn.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Look at the top Unit and top Special card from your Deck. Draw 1 and shuffle the other back.

Yarpen Zigrin.name: Yarpen Zigrin
Yarpen Zigrin.info:
Whenever a Dwarf Ally is played, Boost self by 1.
Deploy: Gain Resilience.

Yennefer.name: Yennefer
Yennefer.info: Deploy: Spawn a Unicorn or a Chironex.

Yennefer: The Conjurer.name: Yennefer: The Conjurer
Yennefer: The Conjurer.info:
Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage all the Highest Enemies by 1.
Revenge: Damage all the Highest Enemies by 2.

Zoltan Chivay.name: Zoltan Chivay
Zoltan Chivay.info: Deploy: Move 3 Units to this row on their side. Strengthen moved Allies by 2, Damage moved Enemies by 2.

Zoltan: Animal Tamer.name: Zoltan: Animal Tamer
Zoltan: Animal Tamer.info: Deploy: Spawn Field Marshal Duda Companion or Field Marshal Duda Agitator.
